title: singAra alankAram
sahitya:
singAra alankAram koNDu ninrAL mAtangi maNa mEDaiyil tanga shilai pOla


anupallavi

  angamellAm azhagu pongum pErazhagu tAngum sundaranaiyE ninaindu


caraNam    mANikka sadangai malaraDi koNDadu Ani muttumAlai mArmElE ADiyadu navarattina 
nagai vagai nal mEni shUDiyadu nagai tulanga nANamuDan nangai shiram tAzhttiyE
